results The synthetical sanagole was in conformity with Japanese reference substance in physical chemistry and spectrum characteristics , and had significant radiosensitive effect on tumor cells .结果：合成得到的沙纳唑与日本对照品在理化性质及光谱特征上完全一致，对肿瘤细胞的增敏作用显著。
